review: We bought the Apple-TV to watch movies, but all we end up watching is the movie load, and load, and load, and load. In fact, it took Finding Nemo more than 24 hours to completely load using a fast and reliable DSL connection. We experience the same issue when streaming home videos from our iPhone's. Depending on the length of the iPhone video, it usually takes 5 to 10 minutes to load on average. When streaming just plain music, I can literally set the iPhone right next to the Apple-TV and it still 'hiccups' every so often, having to re-buffer the stream. Maybe we're doing something wrong, but this is completely unacceptable in my opinion which is why I've rated this product 1 star.CONS:Other than what's mentioned above, the Apple-TV really offers nothing but premium content (subscription fee content). If you have cable or satellite television, then you really don't need this product. You can't even add or remove apps. We're Amazon Prime members but this product does not support that.PROS:If you enjoy standing in lines, sitting at stop lights, or watching paint dry, then you certainly won't mind waiting on the Apple-TV.
